meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7578.

td.p: Keith Fudge, a policy analyst from Washington, D.C.
Nancy Bauer, a market research director from Oak Park, Illinois
Deborah Elliott, an educator from Cleveland, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $56,600)

tr.td: IN THE NEWS: 2017
THEY'RE WITH THE BAND
FAMILIAL PHRASES
AROUND THE WORLD
DOWN TO A "SCIENCE"
IT'S NATIONAL HOT DOG MONTH

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: If you\'re good at math and subtract correctly--320 off of 1986--it gives you 1666. What happened in that year that was famous?)
...
(Alex: [To Deborah] The Great Fire of [*], caused in fact by one of the king\'s bakers. )
KeithWhat is
$2,399
NancyWhat is Paris?
$7,801
DeborahWhat is London?
$6,000
London')
